channel.title: How do i make client connect to server
channel.description: got the linksys router just finished portforwarding how do i make it so client connects to server. please be really pacific. and no 1 say find a turtorial or anything stupid cuz u just look dumb. thanks

item.title: How do i make client connect to server
item.dc:creator: @Qbix Qbix
item.description:
@Qbix wrote:

Change the IP Address in the client to either your direct IP which you can find at http://www.whatismyip.com or your No-IP if you have created one. Even though you didnâ€™t want anyone to say it, there are so many guides for setting up no-ip. I suggest using that instead of your real IP.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make client connect to server
